name: Beware The Wheatshifter
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare 52 Compo

  • Move with WASD
  • Hold a direction key while pressing SPACE to cut wheat
  • Get keys
  • Beware the Wheatshifter

Note: Stupidly enough, I saved the level design for last. So there’s a chance that the current levels won’t provide any real challenge.

If you want something more demanding though, take a shot at the editor! (and post any cool maps on here)
